Subcommittee on Space Science and Applications

official_title: A joint resolution to reduce the amount of manmade material in space.

summary.text: Declares that: (1) the National Aeronautics and Space Administration should develop and implement measures to reduce the amount of manmade material in space; and (2) the United States should begin discussions with the Soviet Union and other countries to develop agreements to reduce such material in space.

titles.title: A joint resolution to reduce the amount of manmade material in space.
